questions.text: During its five year run the series featured a total of six angels.  Who were the original three?
questions.explanation:
Sabrina, Jill and Kelly.

	The three original angels were portrayed by Kate Jackson, Farrah Fawcett-Majors and Jaclyn Smith.

questions.text: Which angel had an ex-husband named Bill?
questions.explanation:
Sabrina Duncan.

	Bill Duncan appeared in two episodes during the first season.  He was played by actor Michael Bell.

questions.text: Which of the original 6 angels was not previously a police officer?
questions.explanation:
Julie Rogers.

	Julie was a model prior to taking a job with the Townsend Agency.

questions.text: Which angel was the only one not to participate in an assignment that involved being on a cruise ship?
questions.explanation:
Julie Rogers.

	Season 1 sent Sabrina, Jill and Kelly cruising in "Angels at Sea".  Season 3 adds Kris to the list in "Angels Ahoy".  Season 4's introduction of Tiffany Welles takes place in "Love Boat Angels".

questions.text: Which angel performed in stock theater during her years in junior college?
questions.explanation:
Kris Munroe.

	It was Kris's first paying job.  This information was learned in the season 2 episode "Angel in the Wings" where she goes undercover on a movie set.

questions.text: Which angel's dog, Albert, appears in four episodes?
questions.explanation:
Kelly Garrett.

	Albert is a king poodle who appears in season 1, 2 and 4.

questions.text: Which angel resigned so that she could get married and start a family?
questions.explanation:
Sabrina Duncan.

	Kate Jackson left the show at the end of season 3.  In the first episode of season 4, Charlie informs his employees that she is pregnant.

questions.text: Which angel was revealed to have paranormal abilities?
questions.explanation:
Tiffany Welles.

	Tiffany's abilities were revealed in the episode "Of Ghosts and Angels".

questions.text: Which two angels were never shown on roller skates?
questions.explanation:
Sabrina and Julie.

	Jill wears roller skates in the season 1 episode "Angels on Wheels".  Kelly, Kris and Tiffany (and Bosly!) all wear them in the season 4 episode "Angels on Skates".

questions.text: Actress Farrah Fawcett-Majors left the show after one season.  How many episodes did she return to guest star in?
questions.explanation:
6.

	She appeared as Jill Munroe in three episodes of season 3 and three episodes of season 4.

questions.text: Which angel's father was a childhood friend of Charles Townsend?
questions.explanation:
Tiffany Welles.

	When Tiffany joins the agency, she offers to show a picture of the mysterious Charlie that her father gave her.  It is a photo of a little boy.

questions.text: Which two angels were hypnotized and turned on their team mates?
questions.explanation:
Kelly and Julie.

	Kelly was hypnotized in the season 1 episode "Seance", and Julie was hypnotized in the season 5 episode "Attack Angels".

questions.text: How many angels appear in a two-piece bikini?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Kelly, Kris and Julie all appear in a two-piece in numerous episodes.  Tiffany once appears in bikini bottoms but with full shirt.

questions.text: Which angel was on the receiving end of a bullet?
questions.explanation:
Kelly Garrett.

	Kelly was shot in the head twice.  Once in season 1 and again in final episode of the series in season 5.

questions.text: Which two angels never went on assignment in Hawaii?
questions.explanation:
Jill and Tiffany.

	Sabrina went in the first episode of season 2, along with Kelly and Kris.  The latter 2 temporarily opened an office there with newcomer Julie in season 5.
